Testing, Testing, 1, 2, 3!

Apr 22, 2025

The date is April 22nd. That’ll be visible right above this text. This is the very first post on my site. As I build, I’m wavering between wanting to make a portofolio, a blog, or a diary. This post lends no clarity on that question.

Oh well! Clarity will come later. For now, my goal is just to get a good handle on Jekyll. If there was a comment section here, I’d invite input. As is… email me? I’ve edited config.yml so my new email address should show up below this post. Maybe I should connect a twitter account too…

Next steps for me and this site: learn more markdown (how do I make a bulleted list?), stop typing post content directly into vscode, install a theme or otherwise customise UX, and of course, go live instead of doing all of this locally.
